content: a gorgeous shell scarf that is so easy to crochet and the result is a light and airy accessory a pretty project for a lacy crochet scarf and is very fast to make it looks intricate but it actually consists of a one-row repeat the pattern is very adaptable and you can easily customize the scarf to make it wider or longer this stitch can be worked with any weight yarn and a suitable crochet hook measurements scarf pictured measures 80in 193cm long and 9in 23cm wide after blocking and before fringe is added
